Uses of Interface
com.informatica.mdm.bpm.interfaces.data.IApplicationContext

  • Packages that use IApplicationContext 
    Package Description
    com.informatica.mdm.bpm.idd
    IDD-specific implementations of the data interfaces in the SDK.
    com.informatica.mdm.bpm.interfaces
    Provides the adapter interfaces to communicate with a BPM engine.

    • Uses of IApplicationContext in com.informatica.mdm.bpm.idd

      Classes in com.informatica.mdm.bpm.idd that implement IApplicationContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IDDApplicationContext
      Represents the application context of IDD and implements the IDDApplicationContext interface.

      String IBPMProcessGenerator.create(IApplicationContext appContext, ITaskData taskData)
      Creates an instance of a business process in the BPM engine given the specified task details and the related application context.
      void IBPMAdapter.create(IApplicationContext appContext, ITaskData taskData)
      Creates an instance of a business process based on the task data and the application context.

      Executes an action on a task.

      Retrieve the task lineage based on the filter criteria for the tasks.
      ITaskDataPager IBPMAdapter.getTasks(IApplicationContext appContext, List<ITaskFilter> taskFilterList, List<ISortCriteria> sortOrderList, int recordsToReturn)
      Retrieve tasks based on the filter criteria specified in the task filters.
      ITaskType IBPMAdapter.getTaskType(IApplicationContext appContext, ITaskData taskData)

      boolean IBPMAdapter.isUserAllowedToOpenTask(IApplicationContext appContext, String taskId)
      Returns true if a user has sufficient privileges to view the specified task.
      void IBPMAdapter.mergeComplete(IApplicationContext appContext, ITaskData taskData)
      This method is specific to IDD and is called whenever a merge operation takes place within a task context.
      void IBPMAdapter.update(IApplicationContext appContext, ITaskData taskData)
      Updates an instance of a business process with the given task data and the application context.
